Raveners require a steady diet of souls, and a ravener that's unable to feed for too long eventually cannibalizes their own soul. Should a ravener's soul ward ever be reduced to 0 Hit Points by hunger while the ravener has more than 1 Hit Point (see Soul Ward), they lose all traces of their former identity and descend into a feral, nearly mindless state. Even if a ravener husk later consumes soul energy, the transformation can be reversed only via Ravenous Repast. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 37 **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Ravener Husk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=784) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 224 2.0 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), soulsense 60 feet **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28 **Str** +8 **Dex** +0 **Con** +6 **Int** -5 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 35 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +22 **Will** +26 **HP** 325 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Weaknesses** good 10 **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 31
**Boneshatter** **Trigger** The ravener husk takes any amount of bludgeoning damage; **Effect** The ravener's brittle bones shatter, spraying bone shards everywhere. Every creature within a 10-foot emanation of the ravener husk takes 7d6 piercing damage (DC 31 basic Reflex save). --- **Speed** 60 feet, fly 180 feet **Melee** jaws +30 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+16 piercing plus 2d6 negative **Melee** claw +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d4+16 slashing plus 2d6 negative **Breath Weapon** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) The ravener husk breathes a torrent of negative energy that deals 16d6 negative damage in a 40-foot cone (DC 34 basic Reflex save). They can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Ravenous Repast** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The ravener husk makes a jaws Strike against a deceased creature that has been dead no longer than 1 minute, was good aligned, and was at least level 15 in life. The ravener attempts a DC 5 flat check; if successful, they transform back into a ravener with 1 Hit Point in their soul ward.
